analysisPopulations.name: Screened Set
analysisPopulations.description: All participants who signed an informed consent form (ICF) will be included in the Screened Set.

analysisPopulations.name: Enrolled Set
analysisPopulations.description: All participants who signed an ICF and met all eligibility criteria will be included in the Enrolled Set.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Signed ICF and met all eligibility criteria

analysisPopulations.name: Full Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: FAS
analysisPopulations.description: The Full Analysis (FA) Set will include all participants who were enrolled and received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840. The FA Set will be the primary population for all efficacy analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Enrolled and received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840

analysisPopulations.name: Per Protocol Set
analysisPopulations.label: PP
analysisPopulations.description: The Per Protocol (PP) Set will include all participants in the FA Set who have no major protocol deviations that would affect the primary efficacy assessment. The PP Set will be used for sensitivity analyses of the primary efficacy endpoint.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Member of the Full Analysis Set with no major protocol deviations affecting the primary efficacy assessment

analysisPopulations.name: Safety Set
analysisPopulations.description: The Safety Set will include all participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840. The Safety Set will be used for all safety analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacokinetic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: PK
analysisPopulations.description: The Pharmacokinetic (PK) Analysis Set will include all participants in the Safety Set who have sufficient plasma concentration data to allow for the derivation of at least 1 PK parameter.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Member of the Safety Set with sufficient plasma concentration data for derivation of at least 1 PK parameter

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacodynamic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: PD
analysisPopulations.description: The Pharmacodynamic (PD) Analysis Set will include all participants in the Safety Set who have sufficient PD data to allow for the derivation of at least 1 PD parameter.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Member of the Safety Set with sufficient PD data for derivation of at least 1 PD parameter

characteristics.name: Age
characteristics.description: Age in years, calculated from date of informed consent.

characteristics.name: Race
characteristics.description: Race of the participant (American Indian or Alaska Native, Asian, Black or African American, Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander, White, or multiple).

characteristics.name: Ethnicity
characteristics.description: Ethnicity of the participant (Hispanic or Latino, Not Hispanic or Latino).

characteristics.name: Body Mass Index
characteristics.description: Body Mass Index (BMI) in kg/m2 at Baseline.

characteristics.name: Time since initial WD diagnosis
characteristics.description: Time in years since the initial diagnosis of Wilson Disease.

characteristics.name: WD phenotype at diagnosis
characteristics.description: Wilson Disease phenotype at diagnosis (hepatic, neurologic, mixed, asymptomatic, other).

characteristics.name: Baseline 24-hour urinary copper excretion
characteristics.description: 24-hour urinary copper excretion value at baseline.

characteristics.name: Baseline liver function tests
characteristics.description: Baseline values for liver function tests such as ALT, AST, total bilirubin, albumin, and INR.

characteristics.name: Baseline neurological status
characteristics.description: Neurological status at baseline, if applicable.

characteristics.name: Baseline psychiatric status
characteristics.description: Psychiatric status at baseline, if applicable.

characteristics.name: Medical/Surgical History
characteristics.description: Medical and surgical history coded using MedDRA.

characteristics.name: Prior medications for Wilson Disease
characteristics.description: Prior medications used to treat Wilson Disease.

characteristics.name: Pretreatment copper balance
characteristics.description: Measurement of copper balance during the pretreatment period (Day -4 through Day -1).

characteristics.name: Pretreatment molybdenum balance
characteristics.description: Measurement of molybdenum balance during the pretreatment period (Day -4 through Day -1).
